comments:
I am trying to use VE to create AWT ui for a PersonalJava project. 
PersonalJava is based on the JDK 1.1.8 so it's a bit obsolete today but is 
used by some Symbian mobile phones.

When I create a new class that extends java.awt.Frame I get this message:

Error trying to set new file into editor
Reason:
java.lang.NullPointerException

There is a stacktrace in the log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ve.java.core 4 0 feb 23, 2004 22:39:24.236
!MESSAGE Exception
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.BeanProxyUtilities.getMethodProxy
(BeanProxyUtilities.java:273)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.BeanProxyUtilities.readBeanFeature
(BeanProxyUtilities.java:252)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.BeanProxyAdapter.primReadBeanFeature
(BeanProxyAdapter.java:694)
	at org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.BeanProxyAdapter.getBeanProxyValue
(BeanProxyAdapter.java:701)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.BeanProxyAdapter.getInternalBeanPropertyProxy
Value(BeanProxyAdapter.java:681)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.BeanProxyAdapter.getBeanPropertyProxyValue
(BeanProxyAdapter.java:671)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.jfc.core.ComponentProxyAdapter.applyAllSettings
(ComponentProxyAdapter.java:627)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.BeanProxyAdapter.instantiateBeanProxy
(BeanProxyAdapter.java:753)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.CompositionProxyAdapter.initSetting
(CompositionProxyAdapter.java:140)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.core.CompositionProxyAdapter.initBeanProxy
(CompositionProxyAdapter.java:112)
	at 
org.eclipse.ve.internal.java.codegen.editorpart.JavaVisualEditorPart$Setup.run
(JavaVisualEditorPart.java:1664)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:534)

Version of VE: I20040219
Version of Eclipse: 3.0M7

Sorry... the Visual Editor does not support classes based on anything below JDK 
1.3.
M1 released, move all resolved to Verified, as prelude to closing.
M1 released, move all resolved/verified to Closed.
